explanation: Fly above and shoot reaper with rockets. His guns can't reach you and his slow movement prevents him from dodging your slow moving rockets.
Because Soldier's rifle is hat scan, it can keep up with Pharah's rapid movement.
Soldier will shoot Pharah down very quickly. Flying up does not let her escape his rifle.
Aiming at and hitting another flying Pharah is nearly impossible.
This depends on location and skill of the Reaper. If the Reaper is close by, his shotguns win. If the reaper is far, he can escape using his ghost mode.
This depends on location and skill of the Reaper. If the Reaper is close by, his shotguns win. If the reaper is far, he can escape using his ghost mode.
Fly above and shoot reaper with rockets. His guns can't reach you and his slow movement prevents him from dodging your slow moving rockets.
The reaper that can land the most headshots wins.
